game.name: Paddlenoid
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Greetings, fellow humans. Prove you are a one-pod wonder and tilt the future of YOUR galaxy in OUR favor! Grab a friend (or fly solo) and join our brick-breaking riot. Explore 33 levels, fight 3 bosses and ignore the glitch crystals.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Greetings, fellow humans. Prove you are a one-pod wonder and tilt the future of YOUR galaxy in OUR favor! Grab a friend (or fly solo) and join our brick-breaking riot. Explore 33 levels, fight 3 bosses and ignore the glitch crystals.
